content.sandbox: allow-same-origin allow-scripts allow-popups allow-forms allow-modals allow-downloads

SAC_url.description: The base url of your SAC story. Example: (For single tenant systems '/tenants/<YOUR_TENANT>' may be left out) https://<YOUR_HOST>.sapanalytics.cloud/sap/fpa/ui/tenants/<YOUR_TENANT>/app.html#/story2?shellMode=embed&/s2/<YOUR_STORY>/?url_api=true&pageBar=disable&view_id=story2
